import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteAccountModal from'./Modal';import'./AccountManagement.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountManagement=()=>{const[userData,setUserData]=useState({name:'',email:''});const[password,setPassword]=useState({oldPassword:'',newPassword:''});const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);// Control modal visibility

localStorage.removeItem('token');navigate('/');}}catch(error){if(error.response&&error.response.status===403){setMessage('Session expired.
